articles.title: Box Office: ‘The Batman’ Rules Again, Crosses $300 Million in North America - Variety
articles.description: Robert Pattinson’s gritty superhero adventure “The Batman” is the No. 1 movie at the domestic box office for the third weekend in a row. That feat is not surprising because March has been relatively light in terms of new releases. But even though there hasn’t…

articles.title: Prince William, Kate try to boost UK bonds on Caribbean trip - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
